data.text: @KingstonHSC I have every intention of continuing to wear a mask in public, as I've enjoyed at least 2 years cold and flu free, as well as Covid-free (as far as I know). Required masking in hospitals and other patient-care facilities, as well as nursing homes, makes a lot of sense! #Health😷

Specifically, KHSC continues to experience high numbers of staff who are unable to work due to testing positive for COVID-19 or having a positive family member at home. The decision to keep safety measures in place is largely consistent with many acute care hospitals in Ontario.
